title: "There Are 186 Endings In The Game" - The Quarry Developer Interview
description:
We chat to The Quarry's Creative Director Will Byles about the game's various choices and consequences, and how those can lead to a whopping 186 different endings.

#summergamefest #thequarry

title: A Plague Tale Requiem Presentation | Tribeca Games Spotlight 2022
description:
Learn more about A Plague Tale Requiem, the sequel to A Plague Tale Innocence in this presentation by the developers at Asobo Studios during the Tribeca Games Spotlight.

In A Plague Tale Requiem head on a journey into a brutal, breathtaking world twisted by supernatural forces.

After escaping their devastated homeland, Amicia and Hugo travel far south, to new destinations. There, they attempt to start a new life and find a way to deal with Hugo’s curse.

But, when Hugo’s powers reawaken, death and destruction return in a flood of devouring rats. Forced to flee once more, the siblings place their hopes in a prophesized island that may hold the key to saving Hugo.

#plaguetale #summergamefest #tribecagames

title: Cuphead The Delicious Last Course Presentation | Tribeca Games Spotlight 2022
description:
Learn more about the latest DLC coming to Cuphead, The Delicious Last course. Get a behind the scenes look with Studio MDHR at how some of the game was made and the thought process behind it. This presentation was showcased during the Tribeca Games Spotlight.

Cuphead: The Delicious Last Course is releaseing on June 30th, 2022. Legendary Chalice will be returning as a new playable character going by "Ms. Chalice", and that there will be new bosses, levels, and a new friendly character called Chef Saltbaker. The DLC is preceded by Cuphead.

#Cuphead #summergamefest #tribecagames

title: Cuphead: The Delicious Last Course Boss Gameplay
description:
We got a chance to see some Cuphead The Delicious Last Course DLC. Get a glimpse of Ms Chalice in action against a new boss called Mortimer Freeze in the "Snow Cult Scuffle", as well as an original boss fight against Ribby and Croaks in "Clip Join Calamity". 

In Cuphead: The Delicious Last Course, Cuphead and Mugman are joined by Ms Chalice for this new adventure on a brand new island! With the new DLC comes new weapons, new charms, and Ms Chalice's new abilities, take on a new cast of multi-faceted, screen-filling bosses to assist Chef Saltbaker in Cuphead's final quest.

#Cuphead #Summergamefest #gaming

title: Epic Games Store Summer Showcase, and Tribeca Game Spotlight 2022 Livestream
description:
Tune in for the Epic Games Summer Showcase, featuring new announcements and updates for PC titles on the Epic Games Store! Afterwards is the Tribeca Game Spotlight 2022, which will showcase exclusive gameplay and creator interviews from Tribeca’s official selections. Games that are part of the Tribeca Games Selections include: A Plague Tale: Requiem, American Arcadia, As Dusk Falls, Cuphead - The Delicious Last Course, Immortality, Oxenfree II: Lost Signals, The Cub, Thirsty Suitors, and Venba.

#Gaming

title: Epic Games Summer Showcase | Summer Game Fest 2022
description:
Tune into the Epic Games Summer Showcase for new announcements and updates for PC titles on the Epic Games Store! Check it out on June 10 at 2:00 PM ET for exciting new trailers, release dates, and more. 

Epic Games Summer Showcase joins one of the many events as part of Summer Game Fest, you won't want to miss it.

#EpicGames #Summergamefest

title: Fall Guys Free For All Cinematic Trailer | Epic Games Showcase
description:
The new 'Free For All' Season of Fall Guys is almost here, so enjoy a fun cinematic trailer!

Get ready to compete in the Blunderdome with spectacular new Rounds, obstacles and costumes!

Fall Guys Free for All comes to the Epic Games Store on June 21!

title: Goat Simulator 3 Trailer | Epic Games Showcase
description:
Check out a brief glimpse at Goat Simulator 3 gameplay exclusive to the Epic Games Store.

#summergamefest #epicgamesshowcase #goatsimulator

title: Netflix Geeked Week - Day 5 Livestream | Games Showcase, Resident Evil
description: It's Netflix's Geeked Week, a celebration and showcase of all things geeked coming from Netflix. Day 5 includes the Games Showcase, The Cuphead Show! Table Read, Resident Evil star Ella Balinska LIVE and more.

title: Nightingale Gameplay Overview | Summer Game Fest 2022
description:
Nightingale is a mysterious and fantastical world where you need to survive and craft while using Realm Cards to traverse through randomly generated worlds and distinct customized realms. Check out our interview with Aaryn Flynn, CEO of Inflexion Games as he breaks down what makes the gameplay so special. 

Set out on a journey of survival and adventure, into the mysterious and dangerous Fae Realms of Nightingale to become an intrepid Realmwalker. Play solo or with your friends as you explore, craft, build and fight across a visually stunning gaslamp fantasy world.

#summergamefest #nightingale

title: Outriders Worldslayer Endgame Reveal Full Presentation
description:
Check out the latest Outriders Broadcast this time featuring the end game of Worldslayer the upcoming expansion.

Outriders is a 1-3 player co-op RPG shooter set in an original, dark and desperate sci-fi universe. As mankind bleeds out in the trenches of Enoch, you’ll create your own Outrider and embark on a journey across the hostile planet.

#Outriders

title: The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria Official Announcement Trailer | Epic Games Showcase
description:
The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria is a survival crafting game set in the Fourth Age of Middle-earth, in the iconic fantasy world created by J.R.R. Tolkien.

"Summoned to the Misty Mountains by Lord Gimli Lockbearer, players take control of a company of Dwarves tasked to reclaim the lost spoils from the Dwarven homeland of Moria--known as Khazad-dûm or Dwarrowdelf--in the depths below their very feet. Their quest will require fortitude, delving deep into the Mines of Moria to recover its treasures."

The game takes place in the Dwarven realm of Moria and has procedurally generated worlds so "no two adventures are alike," the developers said. The game is playable solo or in co-op.

#LOTR #Epicgamesshow #summergamefest

title: Tribeca Games Spotlight Livestream 2022
description:
Tune into the Tribeca Games digital showcase to get a look at exclusive gameplay and creator interviews from Tribeca’s official selections. Games that are part of the Tribeca Games Selections include: A Plague Tale: Requiem, American Arcadia, As Dusk Falls, Cuphead - The Delicious Last Course, Immortality, Oxenfree II: Lost Signals, The Cub, Thirsty Suitors, and Venba.

#TribecaGames #SummerGameFest

title: Aliens: Dark Descent Official Reveal Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2022
description:
Focus Entertainment, makers of A Plague Tale, announced Aliens: Dark Descent, an all-new isometric shooter set in the Aliens universe. Strap up again to take out xenomorphs.

#Summergamefest #aliens #gamingnews #gamespot

title: Best Summer Game Fest 2022 Trailers
description:
Summer Game Fest 2022 just wrapped up and with it came a bunch of brand new trailers, updates and more. Here are some of our favorites that we got to see today including The Last of Us Remake, Guiles reveal in Street Fighter 6, more from Zenless Zone Zero, an extended Callisto Protocol trailer cut by Glen Schofield, more from Nightingale, a fresh look at Marvel Midnight Suns and much more. description:
Check out the first mission in COD: Modern Warfare II, Dark Water from Summer Game Fest 2022. We get a glimpse at the first campaign mission in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 where you fight your way through an oil rig.

Modern Warfare II is set to release worldwide on October 28, 2022. Pre-orders of all editions grant "early" access to the open multiplayer beta. Modern Warfare 2 will be releasing on PC, PlayStation 4 and 5, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X and S.

#Callofduty #modernwarfare #summergamefest #cod

description:
Infinity Ward showcases gameplay of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2s first mission Dark Water and introduces us to the members of Task Force 141, including Soap MacTavish, Ghost, Roach, and Captain Price. 

#Callofduty #modernwarfare2 #summergamefest

description:

#summergamefest #choochoocharles

title: Cult of the Lamb Release Date Trailer | Devolver Direct 2022
description:
Cult of the Lamb launches on August 11 for Nintendo Switch, PS, XB, and PC: http://cultofthelamb.com | Pre-Purchase and Demo on Steam Now!

Start your own cult in a land of false prophets, venturing out into diverse and mysterious regions to build a loyal community of woodland worshippers and spread your Word to become the one true cult.

#Cultoflamb #devolverdigital

title: Cuphead: The Delicious Last Course Full Presentation | Summer Game Fest 2022
description:
The long-awaited DLC to Cuphead is nearly here. The difficult, beautifully stylized side-scrolling shooter, is back with Chalice, a new playable character. Cuphead: The Delicious Last Course is expected to release on June 30 for PC, Nintendo Switch, PS4, and Xbox. During Summer Game Fest, we got an all-new look at Chalice taking on a new boss.

#summergamefest #cuphead #cuphead

title: Cyberpunk Edgerunners — Official Teaser Trailer | Netflix
description:
CD PROJEKT RED + Studio Trigger have brought to you Cyberpunk: Edgerunners, a 10-episode anime story coming to Netflix. Jack in September 2022. 

The series tells a standalone, 10-episode story about a street kid trying to survive in Night City a technology and body modification-obsessed city of the future. Having everything to lose, he stays alive by becoming an edgerunner, a mercenary outlaw also known as a cyberpunk.  Check out the trailer which was showcased during Netflix Geeked Week.

#Cyberpunk2077 #Edgerunners #Geekedweek

title: Day of the Devs Full Presentation | Summer Game Fest 2022
description:
Check out the full Day of the Devs showcase featuing a first look at gameplay for Planet of Lana, as well as a gameplay look at Choo Choo Charles.

#Summergamfest #dayofthedevs

This new trailer for Honkai Starrail showcases a brand new realm for players to explore when the game releases soon.

#summergamefest #honkaistarrail

title: Last of Us Remake Official Announcement Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2022
description:
Relive the classic journey with Ellie and Joel, The Last of Us Part 1 is being remade for the PlayStation 5 and is coming out on PS5 and PC on September 2, 2022.   

#LastofUs #Summergamefest #gaming

title: Layers of Fears Official Reveal Trailer 2022 | Summer Game Fest
description:
Check out the Layers of Fears reveal trailer that was shown off during the Summer Game Fest 2022. Bloober team is the team working on the new Layers of Fear and the game will be release in early 2023 on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X and S.

#summergamefest #layersoffears

title: Marvel's Midnight Suns Hands-On Preview
description:
The logical pitch for Marvel's Midnight Suns is XCOM but with superheroes. But in fact, the new Marvel title from developer Firaxis Games isn't another XCOM game--it's something very different.

The team behind Marvel's Midnight Suns are best known for XCOM, the stellar tactical strategy series about sending squads of elite soldiers against an invading alien force, and often, watching those soldiers die horrifically. The logical pitch for Midnight Suns, then, is XCOM but with superheroes. But in fact, the new Marvel title from developer Firaxis Games is much more RPG than strategy title. This isn't another XCOM game--it's something very different.

As Firaxis notes, Midnight Suns focuses on some of the more "spooky" elements of the Marvel universe, including its more arcane heroes. The initial premise is  pretty standard: The evil military group Hydra uses some occult weirdness to resurrect a supervillain named Lilith, the Mother of Demons, and starts aiding her in taking over the world. To combat that threat, characters like Doctor Strange and Iron Man band together with  more supernaturally-inclined folks from around the Marvel universe, such as Blade, Ghost Rider, and Magick. Included in that group is The Hunter, a fully customizable character you create, who is also Lilith's child and the chosen one who can stop her once and for all.

GameSpot recently got a chance to play about five hours of Midnight Suns at Firaxis's studios in Baltimore, which gave us a close look at the beginning of the game. And yes, this is a turn-based tactical strategy game--but what surprised me most was how much of the game is taken up by storytelling and character interaction. It probably has the most in common with the more character-driven XCOM: Chimera Squad, but even that game pales in comparison to the focus on story in Midnight Suns.

#MidnightSons #SummerGameFest

title: Marvel's Midnight Suns New Character Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2022
description:
Marvel's Midnight Suns blasted the Metallica in this upcoming trailer revealing Venom facing off against Lilith, who seems to take control. Spider-Man was also shown fighting alongside Blade to take down Lilith and all-new horrifying versions of Venom and Hulk. 

#marvelsmidnightsuns #summergamefest #gamingnews

title: Netflix Geeked Week - Day 4 Livestream | Stranger Things Day
description: It's Netflix's Geeked Week, a celebration and showcase of all things geeked coming from Netflix. Day 4 is Stranger Things Day, including Stranger Things 4 Vol. 1: Unlocked, and The Hellfire Club: A Stranger Things Dungeons & Dragons Adventure.

title: Nightingale Gameplay and Features Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2022
description:
Summer Game Fest 2022 brought a brand new trailer for Nightingale, a first person action crafting game. The latest trailer featured crafting Realm Cards which allows players to activate a portal to new locations, enemies, and challenges. Nightingale has no set release date.

#nightingale #summergamefest

title: One Piece Odyssey Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2022
description:
Namco is bringing the popular anime and Manga series back into a new JRPG,One Piece Odyssey. In this all new trailer, we got a look at the swashbuckling crew, bursting from sea into the clouds. The game is expected to release in 2022 for PS5 and Xbox.

#Onepieceodyssey #summergamefest

title: Routine Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2022
description:
Routine is a space-themed horror game from Lunar Software and Raw Fury, with music composed by Doom 2016's Mick Gordon. 

#Routine #summergamefest #gamingnews

title: Saints Row Boss Factory Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2022
description:
Design your own boss in this character creator demo that carries over in the full release of the Saints Row. Available now!

#Summergamefest #Saintsrow #gamingnews

title: Saints Row Character Creator Gameplay
description:
The Saints Row games have always been known for their robust character creation tools, and the new installment is no different. Here's a demo showing off all the character creation features.

The Saints Row reboot may not be out for a few months, but this free Boss Factory demo lets you create your boss right now. You can share your boss and even transfer them to the full game when it releases on August 23, 2022.

Saints Row is an open world, action adventure game that puts you in the shoes of the Saint's boss. Like previous games in the series, players will be able to customize their character and gang in a number of ways including tricking out hideouts, vehicles, weapons, and gang members.

Saints Row also boasts a new fictional setting. In Santa Ileso, players will explore a crime-ridden city complete with rival gangs and whacky side activities. You will also be able to explore the world in co-op. For more on Saints Row, stay tuned to GameSpot.

#Summergamefest #saintsrow

title: Stormgate Announcement Cinematic Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2022
description:
Check out the world premiere trailer for Stormgate, a free-to-play RTS from Frost Giant Studios that features 3-player open-ended co-op and competitive multiplayer. The team at Frost Giant Studios helped make Starcraft and World of Warcraft. RTS is back!

#summergamefest #stormgate

title: Stormgate Full Presentation | Summer Game Fest
description:
Stormgate is a free-to-play RTS from Frost Giant Studios that features 3-player open-ended co-op and competitive multiplayer. 2023 Beta sign-up taking place now. 

#stormgate #summergamefest

title: Street Fighter 6 Guile Official Reveal Trailer | Summer Game Fest June 2022
description:
Capcom's flagship fighting game Street Fighter is back with the latest numerical entry, Street Fighter 6. A classic character has entered the fray with Guile showing off his classic Sonic Boom. Street Fighter 6 releases in 2023.

#Summergamefest #sf6

title: Summer Game Fest 2022 Full Presentation
description:
Geoff Keighley's Summer Game Fest 2022 was filled with world premieres and in-depth looks at previously-announced games. We got a longer look at Dead Space's spiritual successor The Callisto Protocol, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 gameplay, and Cuphead : The Delicious Last Course. There were also new reveals like Midnight Fight Express and the sci-fi horror game Fort Solis.

#Summergamefest #sgf2022

title: Summer Game Fest Livestream 2022
description:
Tune into Summer Game Fest hosted by Geoff Keighley to get a glimpse at brand new gameplay, world premieres, news, trailers, reveals and more on June 9th, 11AM PDT.  Plus Day of the Devs right after the Summer Game Fest Showcase!

So far confirmed to be at the showcase is the first level of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 gameplay, a look a Callisto Protocol gameplay, a special guest appearance by Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson, Street Fighter 6, Marvel's Midnight Suns, a look at Warhammer 40,000: Darktide, Gotham Knights, Nightingale features and gameplay, an exclusive new look at Cuphead: The Delicious Last Course, a continued partnership with Day of the Devs, and much more.

#SummerGameFest #SGF2022 #Gaming

title: Summer Game Fest, Day of the Devs, and Devolver Direct Livestream
description:
Tune in for day one of Summer Game Fest, with the kick off livestream featuring host Geoff Keighley as he brings world premieres, gameplay demos, trailers, news and more! We'll get to see gameplay from Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2's first mission, as well as a first look at the gameplay of Callisto Protocol. Other games that have been announced as part of the showcase include: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide, One Piece Odyssey, Cuphead The Last Delicious Course, Nightingale, Sonic Frontiers, Gotham Knights and more. Also, we'll get a special appearance by the Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson who will speak on his time in Fortnite, as well as his role in the upcoming Black Adam.

Following the Summer Game Fest showcase will be Day of the Devs, who will showcasing some some of the brightest upcoming indie games. 

Not too soon after we'll get a look at what Devolver Digital has cooking up with its Devolver Direct 2022. Find out more about the Cult of Lamb, a new game from the makers of Gorn and Genitial Jousting Free Lives, and 2 brand new game reveals. All this will be hosted by Mecha Suda 51.

#SummerGameFest #DayoftheDevs #devolverdirect 

Timestamps:
1:32:46 - SGF GameSpot Pre-Show
1:59:40 - Summer Game Fest
3:54:25 - SGF GameSpot Post-Show
4:29:15 - Day of the Devs
5:43:34 - Devolver Digital GameSpot Pre-Show
5:57:16 - Devolver Digital Marketing Countdown to Marketing
6:20:36 - Devolver Digital GameSpot Post-Show

title: Super People Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2022
description:
Super People is a new battle royale from Wonder People and Wonder Games. Each character has their own unique skills and fight to be the last one standing.

#superpeople #summergamefest

title: TMNT: Shredders Revenge Casey Jones Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2022
description:
TMNT: Shredder's Revenge gets an all new trailer showing off new playable characters including Casey Jones and April O'Neil. The trailer showed off 6 player mode, so now all the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles can battle it out alongside Splinter, Casey, and April. TMNT: Shredder's Revenge is expected to release June 16, 2022.

#TMNT #Summergamefest

title: The Callisto Protocol Extended Trailer Reveal (Schofield Cut)
description:
At Summer Game Fest Live 2022, Glen Schofield from Striking Distance Studios brought an extended cut of The Callisto Protocol trailer that was shown off at Sony's State of Play in June 2022. 

#SummerGameFest #callistoprotocol #gamingnews #gamespot

title: The Callisto Protocol Full Presentation with Glen Schofiefld | Summer Game Fest 2022
description:
Glen Schofield, former Dead Space lead and founder of Striking Distance Studios, took the stage at Summer Game Fest 2022 to showcase exclusive gameplay from The Callisto Protocol. In this clip they showcased the main character Jacob utilizing a Gravity Gun called The Grip to tear apart enemies.

#summergamefest #callistoprotocol

title: The Callisto Protocol Gameplay | Summer Game Fest 2022
description:
In this latest gameplay clip of The Callisto Protocol from Summer Game Fest 2022, protagonist Jacob can be seen fighting off against his enemies utilizing a Gravity Gun called "The Grip". We see him utilizing it to pick up enemies and toss them into fans, all before being torn apart himself in a gory scene. The Callisto Protocol releases on December 2, 2022.

#Summergamefest #callistoprotocol #gamingnews #gamespot

title: The Last of Us Full Presentation | Summer Game Fest 2022
description:
Naughty Dog unveiled a brand new standalone title based on multiplayer in The Last of Us. They showed off concept art from the game, and say it's bigger than any single-player game they've ever done. More information will unveil next year. The Last of Us show is coming to HBO, helmed by the creator of HBO's Chernobyl, is just about wrapped up with filming almost over, and Pedro Pascal and Bella Ramsey starring in the main roles. Troy Baker and Ashley Johnson will have roles in the show as well.

The Last of Us part 1 is being remade for modern consoles as a definitive edition. The Last of Us is commonly considered to be one of the greatest games of the last decade, so fans can play the game remade from the ground up. The AI, combat, and overall gameplay has been redone to more so to match what the team learned from The Last of Us 2. The Last of Us Part 1 Remake releases September 2, 2022.

#summergamefest #lastofus

title: Warframe: The Duviri Paradox Reveal Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2022
description:
Warframe continues to grow and expand. The long awaited Duviri Paradox is finally coming for players to explore. Check out this presentation at Summer Game Fest 2022.

#warframe #summergamefest

title: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide Gameplay Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2022
description:
Warhammer 40K: Darktide is a four player co-op shooter, where you and other players must fend off hordes of foes in classic Left 4 Dead fashion. The gameplay trailer showed off dark and grim visuals, as players work together to fend off hordes and complete tasks. The game is expected to release September 13. 

#Warhammer40k #Summergamefest #darktide

title: Witchfire Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2022
description:
From the Devs that brought you The Vanishing of Ethan Carter comes a brand new dark fantasy first person shooter, Witchfire. Early access comes soon, but with no specific date as of yet.

#witchfire #summergamefest

title: Zenless Zone Zero Brand New Combat Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2022
description:
From the team that brought you Genshin Impact comes a brand new Futuristic Urban Action Game, Zenless Zone Zero. The trailer showcased ZZZ's 3rd person action combat, as it's characters flipped around with swords fighting off against mechs. ZZZ, or Zenless Zone Zero, has no specific release date.

#ZZZ #summergamefest #zenlesszonezero
